    Since:

    Version:
    0.1
    Author:

    • Method Detail

      • createHitboxFromType

        Hitbox createHitboxFromType(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Create a hitbox that matches the hitbox of a given entity type. This will use reflection to pull from NMS if the value has not been calculated already. Use createHitboxFromEntity(Entity) for real entities. This method is not stable for certain types.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity to match the hitbox to
        Returns:
        the generated hitbox, or null if it could not be produced.

      • createHitboxFromEntity

        Hitbox createHitboxFromEntity(org.bukkit.entity.Entity entity)
        Create a hitbox that matches the hitbox of a given entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - the entity to match the hitbox to
        Returns:
        the generated hitbox, or null if it could not be produced.

      • createHitbox

        Hitbox createHitbox(org.bukkit.util.Vector min,
                    org.bukkit.util.Vector max)
        Create a hitbox using a minimum and maximum Vector. The origin should be considered to be at the center of the entity's feet.
        Parameters:
        min - the minimum XYZ vector
        max - the maximum XYZ vector
        Returns:
        the generated hitbox

      • createFakeEntity

        FakeEntity createFakeEntity(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type)
        Creates a fake entity of the given type. By default, this does NOT include the modifiers. The metadata of the entity will not be pre-populated with the default values. To do this, use createFakeEntity(EntityType, boolean). This fake entity will attempt to be pre-populated with a hitbox generated by createHitboxFromType(EntityType) - this may fail for some entity types. It will also be given an entity ID and unique ID.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity that should be created
        Returns:
        the generated fake entity

      • createFakeEntity

        FakeEntity createFakeEntity(org.bukkit.entity.EntityType type,
                            boolean lookupModifiers)
        Creates a fake entity of the given type. If desired, this method can also populate a map containing the possible entity metadata values for this entity type. This fake entity will be pre-populated with a hitbox generated by createHitboxFromType(EntityType). It will also be given an entity ID and unique ID.
        Parameters:
        type - the type of the entity that should be created
        lookupModifiers - whether or not to pre-populate the metadata field map
        Returns:
        the generated fake entity

      • isFakeEntity

        boolean isFakeEntity(int entityID)
        Returns true if the entity ID given belongs to a fake entity produced by this factory.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entity ID to check
        Returns:
        whether or not the entity is fake

      • getFakeByID

        FakeEntity getFakeByID(int entityID)
        Gets a FakeEntity object by its entity ID.
        Parameters:
        entityID - the entity ID to retrieve
        Returns:
        the retrieved fake entity object.
